Enemy.Name: Thanos
Enemy.desc: Born on Saturn's moon Titan, Thanos has always been a space-based foe of Earth's superheroes

Enemy.Name: Loki
Enemy.desc: A cunning trickster who had the ability to change his shape and sex
Enemy.greeting: You made a mistake to choose fight with me

Enemy.Name: Doctor doom
Enemy.desc: Ruler of Latveria, nemesis of the Fantastic Four and threat to the entire Universe

Enemy.Name: Baron Zemo
Enemy.greeting: Don't dare to clash with me

Enemy.Name: Skrull
Enemy.greeting: I will crush you like an insect.

Enemy.Name: Ultron
Enemy.greeting: Don't dare to clash with us

Enemy.Name: Count Nefaria
Enemy.greeting: Don't dare to clash with us
